Egedege N'Okaro bụ ụlọ elu mbụ na ala eze Benin  na na mpaghara Mid-Western, Naijiria nke bụ steeti Edo na Delta ugbu a
Ọ bụ Late Chief Iyamu, Inneh si obodo Benin wuru ya na 1906, Late Chief Iyamu bụ nna nna Osagie Ize-Iyamu
Dị ka ihe ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme si kwuo, Egedege N'Okaro bụ ụlọ mbụ e wuru n'otu ọnụ ụlọ nke e wuru na obodo Benin oge ochie
A na-eji brik e ji ọkụ ọkụ na-acha uhie uhie mee ya bụ́ nke e ji osisi rụọ ya
Onye Britain, Mazị Crawe Reade, onye ọrụ colonial bụ onye na-ahụ maka owuwu ya bụ onye nyere Chief Iyamu nhazi ụlọ ahụ.
